import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function EditFlightx() { const parameter = useParams() const [flight, setFlight] = useState({ id:'', aircraft_iata:'', airline_iata:'', airline_name:'', flight_date:'', flight_status:'' }) // Get Airports from flight microservice useEffect (() => { axios.get("http://localhost:8082/v1/flights/"+ parameter.id) .then( res => { console.log(res.data) setFlight({ id: res.data.id, aircraft_iata: res.data.aircraft_iata, airline_iata:res.data.airline_iata, airline_name:res.data.airline_name, flight_date:res.data.flight_date, flight_status:res.data.flight_status }) } ) },[]) const content =

Update Flight

setFlight({id:'2'})} />
     
return (
{content}
) }
